name: Ninja Birds X Game
description:
IMPROVE YOUR ANGRY BIRDS SKILLS !!!

******************************

Ninja Birds : Angry Bird X Game is an addicting free game which combines elements from angry birds rio, the scoring from paper toss , and an old school classic arcade games feel. Free , fun , and super easy to play. Ninja Birds will keep you entertained for hours. If you're a fan of games like tiny wings , tiny bee , and run run bear you'll enjoy this game too. Download it for free , hit play , and have fun :)

Ninja Birds : Angry Bird X features:
- Simple addicting game play
- Relaxing electronic music
- Old classic arcade games / tron style art
- Improves your angry birds space and rio skills
- Fun for both old players and kids
- Free to download :)
